name: My Mom Told Me To Make A Sandwich
name_original: My Mom Told Me To Make A Sandwich
description:
How to Play:

HOLD WASD: walk

HOLD Shift while WASD: Run

HOLD Left Click: pick up items

Background:

Your mom told you to make a sandwich before she left home. Now you are home alone. She is coming back in 5 minutes. What can you do?

  • Make sandwich
  • Drink Milk
  • Watch TV
  • More sandwich
  • More Milk
  • Start vomitting
  • I told you to stop drinking milk
  • Play with food
  • Make a mess
  • Mom came back and saw what you done
Multiple Endings: 

You can find 14 different endings during the end of the game. (Mom comes back home) Why don't you try to find it out?

Here are 3 little endings. There are 11 more to discover! First 3D Game:

This was my first attempt to make a 3D game. So as you can see I use a lot of free assets, amateur lighting. I tried my best tho. The game was a bit large since I don't know how to optimize the performance within the 14 days. It was quite challenging since I was quite busy doing other stuff so the actual working hours on this game is less than 12 (including watching tutorials). So, thanks for playing, thanks for the support. And I am Racso, from Hong Kong 2022/ 9/23.

  1. Make a sandwich
  2. Drink milk
  3. Throw books
  4. Vomit on sofa
  5. Watch Dragon Ball Z
  6. Make some more sandwich
  7. Drink more milk
  8. Basically you don't have rules. Do whatever you want !
!Attention!

The game was a little bit too large and it couldnt be played on browser. However, you can install the game by downloading it below.

This game was made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

The assets used in this game was not made by me. 

Assets used:

  • Kitchen Environment DevDen Arch Viz Scotland URP
  • Low Poly Kitchen Props and Food Asset
  • FlexsibleCelShader
  • Food from Sketchfab
  • MoveMotion Pack
  • PolygonStarter Pack
  • QuickOutline by Chris Nolet
  • Free Skybox in Unity Assets Store
  • Sound Effects from Youtube
  • No copyright claimed musics
